notes.body: Hello Gopal,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I am sorry to inform you that your order #654843679013052416-57092 and 654155406502502400-93481  was cancelled due to the medicine that you added were unavailable with our Partner Retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.      The refund amount of Rs. 1773.61 was initiated on 3rd December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays).   Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restock the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Gopal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I am sorry to inform you that your order #654843679013052416-57092 and 654155406502502400-93481  was cancelled due to the medicine that you added were unavailable with our Partner Retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. 

The refund amount of Rs. 1773.61 was initiated on 3rd December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays).

Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restock the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22247151  
      Subject: BP monitor replacement request  
      Description:  Hi Pharmeasy Team,   
 I have ordered the Blood pressure machine from Amazon and received on 24th Nov 2025 for 3 days it worked properly but then it has charging issue also not giving reading for blood pressure. I have attached Invoice and video for your reference. 
   
 Requesting you to replace the product as soon as possible. 
   
   
 Thanking you. 
 Ranjita Chavan. 
 8530777440 
   
 

 
 Disclaimer: 
 This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.
notes.body_html:
Merged from ticket 22247151

Subject: BP monitor replacement request

Description:
Hi Pharmeasy Team,

I have ordered the Blood pressure machine from Amazon and received on 24th Nov 2025 for 3 days it worked properly but then it has charging issue also not giving reading for blood pressure. I have attached Invoice and video for your reference.

Requesting you to replace the product as soon as possible.


Thanking you.
Ranjita Chavan.
8530777440


Disclaimer:
This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. notes.body: Hello Ranjita,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​​   I understand your concern. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Ranjita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​​
I understand your concern. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

I would like to inform you that I am highlighting your concern to the internal team and I am sure that they will check and update you at the earliest. I understand your concern about the BP Monitor not working. I will surely assist you with this.

notes.body: Hello Ranjita,     Greetings from PharmEasy.  Please accept our delay in response.   I completely understand your concern with regards to BP Monitor, please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.   As per the update received from our Operations team, the order has been replaced for you from the Amazon platform (Order # 171-3104387-6606722). For more information, please reach out to Amazon customer service.  I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.     For any further assistance, you can also contact the customer service team on 07737 373 026 (10:00 am to 7:00 pm) or reach out to us through our support channels, on the app or Website, listed in the Need Help Section.   Thank you for choosing Pharmeasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Ranjita,

Greetings from PharmEasy.

Please accept our delay in response.
 
I completely understand your concern with regards to BP Monitor, please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.
 
As per the update received from our Operations team, the order has been replaced for you from the Amazon platform (Order # 171-3104387-6606722). For more information, please reach out to Amazon customer service.

I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.
   
For any further assistance, you can also contact the customer service team on 07737 373 026 (10:00 am to 7:00 pm) or reach out to us through our support channels, on the app or Website, listed in the Need Help Section.
 
Thank you for choosing Pharmeasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ajay,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #589872368814645248-55619. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per the records, the order is sent for order confirmation. Our pharmacists were too tired to connect. However, they were unable to connect with you.     Kindly confirm whether the registered number or the delivery contact number is active so that we can arrange a doctor’s call on one of them.  ​   However, I have arranged a callback on the delivery contact number to avoid further delay. Please answer the call to process the order at the earliest      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Ajay,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #589872368814645248-55619. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the records, the order is sent for order confirmation. Our pharmacists were too tired to connect. However, they were unable to connect with you.

Kindly confirm whether the registered number or the delivery contact number is active so that we can arrange a doctor’s call on one of them.
​
However, I have arranged a callback on the delivery contact number to avoid further delay. Please answer the call to process the order at the earliest

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We're excited to invite your organization to register as a vendor for Nestle Malaysia Berhad's 2025/2026 development projects. This is a great opportunity to support our strategic operations and infrastructure developments, while showcasing your products and services on our global Vendor Portal.

To get started, please contact us at inquiry@nestlemalaysiaberhads.com to receive the Vendor Questionnaire and Expression of Interest (EOI) documents. We'd appreciate it if you could confirm your interest as soon as possible, as this is a critical phase in our evaluation and onboarding process.

We're looking forward to working with you and promoting your brand globally.

Best regards,
NURUL HIDAYAH BINTI ROSLAN
Vendor Registration Department
Nestle Malaysia Berhad

  I am writing to propose a collabortion between  us, in which i would like to contribute a guset post to your blog .

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Avendus Capital advises Fisdom on its strategic acquisition by Groww,
      creating a full-stack wealth and broking platform
    

    

  

  
    
    Avendus Capital advises Fisdom on its strategic acquisition by Groww,
      creating a full-stack wealth and broking platform

    
    
    
      
        
          
            
            

              
                
                  
                  
                    

                      
                    
                  
                  
                
              
              
                

                  
                  
                    
                      
                        

                          
                            
                              
                                

                                  
                                    
                                      
                                        

                                      
                                    
                                  
                                
                              

                            
                          
                        
                        
                          

                            
                              
                                
                                  

                                    
                                      
                                        
                                      
                                    

                                  
                                
                                
                              
                            
                          

                        

                        
                          
                            

                              
                                

                                
                                
                                  

                                    
                                      
                                        

                                          
Avendus Capital advises Fisdom
                                                on its strategic acquisition by
                                                Groww, creating a full-stack
                                                wealth and broking platform
                                              

                                          

                                           

                                          
                                              Fisdom (Finwizard Technology
                                              Private Limited) has completed its
                                              strategic acquisition by Groww
                                              (Billionbrains Garage Ventures
                                              Limited). Fisdom’s highly
                                              differentiated wealth management
                                              platform expands Groww’s wealth
                                              management offerings beyond mutual
                                              funds, stocks and derivatives. The
                                              consolidation is expected to
                                              further strengthen its leadership
                                              position as the preferred platform
                                              for Indians to invest and manage
                                              their wealth.
                                            


                                          
                                          

                                          
Avendus Capital acted as the
                                                exclusive financial advisor to
                                                Fisdom on this transaction.
                                              

                                          
                                          
                                          
                                              Fisdom and Groww have developed
                                              strong technology platforms and
                                              demonstrated operational
                                              excellence, enabling customers to
                                              invest seamlessly and participate
                                              in India’s broader macro growth
                                              story. Their complementary product
                                              offerings and customer bases are
                                              highly synergistic, positioning
                                              Groww to expand meaningfully into
                                              the large and fast-growing
                                              Investment and Wealth Management
                                              market, estimated at ~INR 1.1
                                              trillion as of March 2025
                                              projected to grow at a CAGR of
                                              15-17% between FY25 and FY30,
                                              reaching INR 2.2-2.6 trillion by
                                              FY30.
                                            

                                          
                                          

                                          
                                              
Subramanya S.V (“Subu”),
                                                Co-founder & CEO, Fisdom
                                              
                                              said, "Anand Dalmia and I are
                                              grateful to our customers, team
                                              (current as well as past),
                                              partners, and investors who helped
                                              build Fisdom with belief and
                                              passion. It has been an incredible
                                              journey over the years that is set
                                              to get better."
                                            


                                          
                                          
                                          
                                              He added, "This is neither a sale
                                              nor an exit for us. It’s a
                                              collaboration that gives us the
                                              opportunity to build something
                                              bigger and more enduring. As we
                                              join forces with Lalit Keshre,
                                              Harsh Jain, Ishan Bansal, Neeraj
                                              Singh and the Groww team, we are
                                              incredibly excited about what lies
                                              ahead. The Groww team operates
                                              with tremendous clarity,
                                              relentless focus on execution, and
                                              uncompromising focus on the
                                              customer (a rare trait in the
                                              industry) which make them the
                                              right partners to continue our
                                              journey further.”
                                            


                                          
                                          
                                          
                                              
Pankaj Naik, Managing Director
                                                and Co-Head, Digital, Technology
                                                & Consumer Investment Banking,
                                                Avendus Capital
                                              

                                              said, “Subu and Anand have built a
                                              truly unique wealth platform
                                              through a technology-first
                                              approach and deep partnerships
                                              with large banks. This transaction
                                              represents an ongoing trend of
                                              transformative M&As in fintech,
                                              which are increasingly driving
                                              strategic value-unlocking and
                                              growth opportunities. We are proud
                                              to have partnered with Fisdom and
                                              its shareholders on this landmark
                                              transaction.”
                                            

                                        
                                      
                                    
                                  
                                

                                

                                
                              
                            
                          
                        

                        

                          
                            
                              
                                

                                  
                                    
                                      
                                        
Know More

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Avendus Capital advises Fisdom on its strategic acquisition by Groww, creating a full-stack wealth and broking platform
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Avendus Capital advises Fisdom on its strategic acquisition by Groww, creating a full-stack wealth and broking platform
Avendus Capital advises Fisdom on its strategic acquisition by Groww, creating a full-stack wealth and broking platform
 
Fisdom (Finwizard Technology Private Limited) has completed its strategic acquisition by Groww (Billionbrains Garage Ventures Limited). Fisdom’s highly differentiated wealth management platform expands Groww’s wealth management offerings beyond mutual funds, stocks and derivatives. The consolidation is expected to further strengthen its leadership position as the preferred platform for Indians to invest and manage their wealth.

Avendus Capital acted as the exclusive financial advisor to Fisdom on this transaction.

Fisdom and Groww have developed strong technology platforms and demonstrated operational excellence, enabling customers to invest seamlessly and participate in India’s broader macro growth story. Their complementary product offerings and customer bases are highly synergistic, positioning Groww to expand meaningfully into the large and fast-growing Investment and Wealth Management market, estimated at ~INR 1.1 trillion as of March 2025 projected to grow at a CAGR of 15-17% between FY25 and FY30, reaching INR 2.2-2.6 trillion by FY30.

Subramanya S.V (“Subu”), Co-founder & CEO, Fisdom said, "Anand Dalmia and I are grateful to our customers, team (current as well as past), partners, and investors who helped build Fisdom with belief and passion. It has been an incredible journey over the years that is set to get better."

He added, "This is neither a sale nor an exit for us. It’s a collaboration that gives us the opportunity to build something bigger and more enduring. As we join forces with Lalit Keshre, Harsh Jain, Ishan Bansal, Neeraj Singh and the Groww team, we are incredibly excited about what lies ahead. The Groww team operates with tremendous clarity, relentless focus on execution, and uncompromising focus on the customer (a rare trait in the industry) which make them the right partners to continue our journey further.”

Pankaj Naik, Managing Director and Co-Head, Digital, Technology & Consumer Investment Banking, Avendus Capital said, “Subu and Anand have built a truly unique wealth platform through a technology-first approach and deep partnerships with large banks. This transaction represents an ongoing trend of transformative M&As in fintech, which are increasingly driving strategic value-unlocking and growth opportunities. We are proud to have partnered with Fisdom and its shareholders on this landmark transaction.”
Know More

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
View Online
Join our Exclusive User Training Session
Register Now
Hello!
We’re happy to invite you to our upcoming Nitro's exclusive user training session
18th December 2025 at 03:30 PM!
Whether you're switching from another PDF tool or just starting out with Nitro,
this 45 minutes, interactive session will help you get the most out of it.
During this engaging training session, we will cover:
  • Introduction to Nitro PDF Pro for Windows: Discover the core features and benefits of Nitro PDF Pro for Windows. The most frequently used Nitro PDF Pro features will be demonstrated in end-to-end workflows for relatable use cases.
  • Navigating Nitro PDF Pro: Get comprehensive guidance on navigating the Nitro PDF Pro interface.
  • Tips and tricks: Uncover hidden gems and best practices to optimize your workflows and productivity through expert techniques.
  • Interactive Q&A: Engage directly with us in a live session to address any specific questions.
Hope to see you there!
Warm Regards,
Saksham Bhasin
Senior Sales Specialist | Nitro

notes.body: Hello Sonali,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the teleconsultation on an alternate number.      Please be informed that we are unable to modify the mobile number for teleconsultation once the order is placed.   ​   I request you to place a new order and add the alternate number as a delivery contact number so we can arrange a teleconsultation or kindly place an order with a valid prescription. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.  ​  Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22247817  
      Subject: Inquiry for Micro Fulfillment / Dark Store Partnership  
      Description:  
 
 Hi Team, 
 My name is Tanay, and I’m interested in partnering with PharmEasy as a micro-fulfillment / dark-store operator in the Sion–Mumbai region. 
 I currently don’t have a warehouse space, but I am ready to acquire a suitable property immediately if your team confirms that this model is open for new partners in Mumbai. 
 Could you please share: 
 
 
 
 Whether PharmEasy currently operates this model through franchise/partner-owned dark stores 
 
 
 Requirements for space (sq ft, layout, specifications) 
 
 
 Commercial terms and expected monthly volumes 
 
 
 Partner onboarding process 
 
 
 I’m highly interested and can move quickly once I receive your guidance. 
 Thanks & regards, 
 Tanay

notes.body_html:
Merged from ticket 22247817

Subject: Inquiry for Micro Fulfillment / Dark Store Partnership

Description:
Hi Team,
My name is Tanay, and I’m interested in partnering with PharmEasy as a micro-fulfillment / dark-store operator in the Sion–Mumbai region.
I currently don’t have a warehouse space, but I am ready to acquire a suitable property immediately if your team confirms that this model is open for new partners in Mumbai.
Could you please share:
  • Whether PharmEasy currently operates this model through franchise/partner-owned dark stores
  • Requirements for space (sq ft, layout, specifications)
  • Commercial terms and expected monthly volumes
  • Partner onboarding process
I’m highly interested and can move quickly once I receive your guidance.
Thanks & regards,
Tanay

Disclaimer:
This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Tanay,  ​     Greetings from PharmEasy!     Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.     Please be informed that we currently offer only online franchise partnerships. We regret to inform you that offline services are not available at this time.     Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:  https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores     Kindly note that once the form is filled, we request that you kindly wait for 5 business days for the call as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further. If you do not receive a call or email within 5 business days to take this further, it means that your partner request has not been considered.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Tanay,
​
Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.

Please be informed that we currently offer only online franchise partnerships. We regret to inform you that offline services are not available at this time.
 
Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:
https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores
 
Kindly note that once the form is filled, we request that you kindly wait for 5 business days for the call as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further. If you do not receive a call or email within 5 business days to take this further, it means that your partner request has not been considered. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Vijay,   Greetings from PharmEasy!   This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.       We would like to inform you that the cash-on-delivery (COD) option was selected while placing the order. However, we have noticed that the payment was made online after the order was placed.     Kindly note that once the COD payment option is chosen, it cannot be waived off or modified in the system. The order will continue to reflect the COD option as selected at the time of placing the order.     We truly appreciate your understanding and cooperation.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to inquire about arranging an online consultation with a skin
care doctor through your platform. The consultation is for my friend’s
wife, who is currently in Russia. She does not understand English, so I
need to be present during the appointment to translate between the doctor
and the patient.

Kindly let me know if it is possible for a translator (myself) to join the
consultation.

Additionally, since the PharmEasy app is in English, my friend’s wife is
finding it difficult to operate the app. Therefore, I would like to ask if
there is any option to conduct the consultation through Zoom, WhatsApp, or
Google Meet instead of the app.

I would appreciate your guidance on whether these arrangements can be made.

Thank you for your support, and I look forward to your response.


Warm regards,

Hari Prakash

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Inquiry Regarding Online Skin Care Consultation With Translator
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,
I hope you are doing well.
I would like to inquire about arranging an online consultation with a skin care doctor through your platform. The consultation is for my friend’s wife, who is currently in Russia. She does not understand English, so I need to be present during the appointment to translate between the doctor and the patient.
Kindly let me know if it is possible for a translator (myself) to join the consultation.
Additionally, since the PharmEasy app is in English, my friend’s wife is finding it difficult to operate the app. Therefore, I would like to ask if there is any option to conduct the consultation through Zoom, WhatsApp, or Google Meet instead of the app.
I would appreciate your guidance on whether these arrangements can be made.
Thank you for your support, and I look forward to your response.

Warm regards,
Hari Prakash

notes.body: Hello ​Hari Prakash,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern regarding the mail.     Please note that we offer online consultations pan India. However, consultations can only be booked using an Indian-registered mobile number.  ​   If you still wish to consult a doctor, you can book an appointment through the PharmEasy application. Simply go to the 'Account' section, click on 'My Consultations', and select a doctor based on your requirements. You may also consult with any other doctor of your choice.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello ​Hari Prakash,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern regarding the mail.

Please note that we offer online consultations pan India. However, consultations can only be booked using an Indian-registered mobile number.
​
If you still wish to consult a doctor, you can book an appointment through the PharmEasy application. Simply go to the 'Account' section, click on 'My Consultations', and select a doctor based on your requirements. You may also consult with any other doctor of your choice.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

I have already received the exact same automated email last month, but no
one has contacted me till date.

notes.body: Hello Nikita,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is in regards to order #655167981393281024-78619.     We tried calling you today, however, were unable to connect with you. As per the update received, we can raise a return request for the item VENUSIA MAX INTENSIVE MOISTURIZING | FOR ALL SKIN TYPES | LOTION | 500 GM . However, if we raise the return request, the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.     If you do not wish to have the refund in the PharmEasy wallet for return requests, you can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders:  1. To set this up in the App, update the App to the most recent version. Click on the Account Icon below. Click on “Set Refund Preferences”. Select the mode of refund that you prefer.  2. To set this up on the website, click on the Account Icon with your name and select “My Profile”. In the menu on the left, go to “Profile Settings” and click on Manage Refunds. Select the mode of refund that you prefer.  3. If payments are received from the PharmEasy wallet and another source, any refunds will be credited to the PharmEasy wallet first and then to the second source.     Please confirm if we can raise a return request with PharmEasy wallet as the refund mode. Please also be informed that the item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and bar code intact.      You can call us on 7666 100 300 to avoid any delay.     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Nikita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regards to order #655167981393281024-78619.

We tried calling you today, however, were unable to connect with you. As per the update received, we can raise a return request for the item VENUSIA MAX INTENSIVE MOISTURIZING | FOR ALL SKIN TYPES | LOTION | 500 GM . However, if we raise the return request, the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.

If you do not wish to have the refund in the PharmEasy wallet for return requests, you can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders:
1. To set this up in the App, update the App to the most recent version. Click on the Account Icon below. Click on “Set Refund Preferences”. Select the mode of refund that you prefer.
2. To set this up on the website, click on the Account Icon with your name and select “My Profile”. In the menu on the left, go to “Profile Settings” and click on Manage Refunds. Select the mode of refund that you prefer.
3. If payments are received from the PharmEasy wallet and another source, any refunds will be credited to the PharmEasy wallet first and then to the second source.

Please confirm if we can raise a return request with PharmEasy wallet as the refund mode. Please also be informed that the item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and bar code intact. 

You can call us on 7666 100 300 to avoid any delay.

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am responding to your email regarding my wife’s order, and I must clarify
that the information you have provided is completely inaccurate.

Your email states that your agent added the additional product only after
receiving proper consent. This is entirely false. During the call, my wife
repeatedly denied adding this item to the cart. Despite her clear refusal,
the agent continued pressuring her for more than 10 minutes to purchase it.
Only after her repeated denials did the agent agree to proceed with the
medicines and assured her that they would be delivered on time. Even then,
she mentioned she would place the additional item in the cart, and my wife
could choose to pay for it only if she wanted to.

At no point did my wife consent to this product being added to her order.
She never confirmed this addition during the call, contrary to what your
email claims.

Because of the misleading communication from your agent, my wife’s original
order was cancelled unnecessarily, causing frustration and inconvenience.
What is even more concerning is that instead of acknowledging the agent’s
misconduct, your email attempts to shift the blame onto the customer, which
is highly dissatisfying and completely unacceptable. This kind of
misrepresentation amounts to unethical and unfair trade practice.

Given this experience, my wife — along with our friends and family — will
not be placing further orders with PharmEasy. We will also be escalating
this matter to the National Consumer Forum and raising it publicly to
ensure that such practices are not repeated with other customers. I
strongly request that you review the call recording and provide an accurate
and honest explanation rather than circulating misleading statements.

Regards,
Vishnu
notes.body_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am responding to your email regarding my wife’s order, and I must clarify that the information you have provided is completely inaccurate.

Your email states that your agent added the additional product only after receiving proper consent. This is entirely false. During the call, my wife repeatedly denied adding this item to the cart. Despite her clear refusal, the agent continued pressuring her for more than 10 minutes to purchase it. Only after her repeated denials did the agent agree to proceed with the medicines and assured her that they would be delivered on time. Even then, she mentioned she would place the additional item in the cart, and my wife could choose to pay for it only if she wanted to.

At no point did my wife consent to this product being added to her order. She never confirmed this addition during the call, contrary to what your email claims.

Because of the misleading communication from your agent, my wife’s original order was cancelled unnecessarily, causing frustration and inconvenience. What is even more concerning is that instead of acknowledging the agent’s misconduct, your email attempts to shift the blame onto the customer, which is highly dissatisfying and completely unacceptable. This kind of misrepresentation amounts to unethical and unfair trade practice.

Given this experience, my wife — along with our friends and family — will not be placing further orders with PharmEasy. We will also be escalating this matter to the National Consumer Forum and raising it publicly to ensure that such practices are not repeated with other customers. I strongly request that you review the call recording and provide an accurate and honest explanation rather than circulating misleading statements.

Regards,
Vishnu

dealing in it .

notes.body: Hello Rajkumar,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to inform you that your order #657921356523704320-59499 was cancelled because the medicine that you added was unavailable with our partner retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.     Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our partner retailer tried to source the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologise that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. You can track your refund via the RRN number: 1765460701154949b699.     If your concern is related to any order, kindly share the order ID. I will be more than happy to check your order and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Himanshu,        Greetings from PharmEasy!  With regards to your order #654840604104589312-13426, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.  As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.   We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.  We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Himanshu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654840604104589312-13426, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello team,

I am writing this email with great frustration w.r.t the medicine delivery
I am expecting from your side since the past 2 days.

Unfortunately, the Delhivery tracking information shows the package is
lying in Thirunelveli, TN for the past 2 days for reasons unknown to me.

For the past 2 consecutive days, I am getting messages on your App that the
delivery is delayed and it will be delivered the next day.

When I placed the order, I was assured a delivery of Dec 1-3 which has been
violated in this case.

Pls. note that this is critical and time-bound medicine delivery, not like
any normal household or cosmetics which can wait for few days.

How do we trust your service if such kind if laxity is shown in a normal
delivery!

I hereby escalate this matter to the concerned and request for a faster
resolution.

Regards
Manoj Pillai
Tel. 8891115899

--

Ticket Id: 83f3105e-5c5a-4af0-9518-b2603885ee62
On Thursday, 04 December 2025 at 11:00,<manoj.pillai1@gmail.com> wrote:

If it's not an automated response, pls. see the details below.

Pls. login with my regd. mobile 8891115899 and see the mess your delivery team has done.

1. AWB#10178484926611 (Medicine delivery from Tata1Mg). This shipement was returned without even a single attempt for delivery and the message given was 'Delivery attempts failed'

2. AWB#9148880997146. (Medicine delivery from PharmEasy). This shipment is struck at Tirenelveli since Dec 1. No reasons given. Just keep getting message from PharmEasy app that delivery is delayed. I am worried, this also will get returned after few days citing the same reason stated above!

How do people like us relay on your service esp. when there is a monopoly for your company on shipments and there is time-bound criticality on what you deliver?

Really unfortunate that a professional handling of such matters is missing.

notes.body: Hello Manoj,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  Due to operational challenges at the courier partner’s end, a delay occurred in the order. As per the latest update received, it can take up to 72 hours to resolve the issue. We are trying our best to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We will notify you once we get a further update. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.   Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello team,

I am writing this email with great frustration w.r.t the medicine delivery
I am expecting from your side since the past 2 days.

Unfortunately, the Delhivery tracking information shows the package is
lying in Thirunelveli, TN for the past 2 days for reasons unknown to me.

For the past 2 consecutive days, I am getting messages on your App that the
delivery is delayed and it will be delivered the next day.

When I placed the order, I was assured a delivery of Dec 1-3 which has been
violated in this case.

Pls. note that this is critical and time-bound medicine delivery, not like
any normal household or cosmetics which can wait for few days.

How do we trust your service if such kind if laxity is shown in a normal
delivery!

I hereby escalate this matter to the concerned and request for a faster
resolution.

Regards
Manoj Pillai
Tel. 8891115899

--
